title.narrative: MSME Growth Accelerator Programme as part of Youth Empowerment and Employment Project

description.narrative: The Sierra Leone MSME Growth Accelerator Programme is a six month program which aims to accelerate growth of innovative, viable, and ambitious MSMEs with transformative economic impact through improved access to finance focusing on blended financing package (Grants, Loans and guarantees), Technical Assistance, and business development services. It is expected to deliver social impact by creating new jobs, addressing social and economic challenges through innovative business models, and providing low-income consumers with new or improved products and services. As part of this project, an “Innovation Challenge” will be launched, which will require MSMEs to address key social and development challenges that align economic growth with the sustainable development goals (SDGs) and the African Union Commission’s Agenda 2063. The Challenge set will not be sector specific, but the applicants would rather need to provide solutions for challenges within the seventeen Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). The sectors will include among others, 1) Agriculture 2) Digital Economy 3) Environment 4) Affordable Renewable energy 5) Education; and 6) Health sector.
